attributes.action: Say NO to another referendum in UK about leaving EU: do not insult the democracy
attributes.additional_details:
UK can retain free trade with the EU without paying high membership fee which costs more than the tariffs we avoid

Outside the EU, UK will be able to negotiate speedily the really worthwhile deals to access fast growing protected markets such as China, India and Brazil which the EU has ignored.

Fall in pound rate in forex? Its a temporary reaction but definitely recoverable. UK is not amature.

Think positive, move forward and say NO to 2nd referendum on brexit/bremain.
attributes.background:
2nd referendum is being demanded because
-Brexit voters were mainly middle class without any voice.
-Bremain will help EU keep deciding indirectly to cut UK welfare benefits and about other internal issues.
-EU is likely to collapse. Frexit, Swexit etc will follow Brexit.


Most importantly,
